mapper.select: select d.id, d.title, d.publish, case when s.min = 3 then 3 -- 결재 완료 when s.max in (0,1) then 1 -- 작성 중 else 2 -- 결재 중 end stat, d.author, e.name, e.dept_id, t.name dept, d.ts from doc d join emp e on e.id = d.author join dept t on t.id = e.dept_id join approval a on a.doc_id = d.id join ( select doc_id, min(stat) min, max(stat) max from approval group by doc_id ) s on s.doc_id = d.id where d.author = #{userId} -- 기안자 or a.approver = #{userId} and a.stat != 0 -- 결재자 or d.publish = true and stat = 3 -- 공지 group by a.doc_id order by stat, d.ts desc limit #{rows}
